I developed several OLS models using different variables. I recorded the various descriptive statistics in the following table.

![](image2.jpg){width="80%"}

It became clear that perccgnonsobap and its complement, perccgbsobap, had less explanatory power than percblack. The most powerful 3 variable model I could develop that kept each variable statistically significant was the following multi-variate model consisting of percblack, avgaborperpop, and college. It has an adjusted R-squared of .8541 and an AIC of -206.564.
